about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS SOUNDTRACK

The Company Man Original Soundtrack by Medibeats features ordinarily enticing office equipment used as instruments to transport you into our wacky workplace 2D platformer.

The album features music composed by Elmer Ho and has been mastered for stand-alone listening. Even if you've enjoyed the music in the company man, each piece is redesigned with the freedom that this format provides.
